alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 16 at 6:15PM CDT until September 16 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL CHERRY COUNTY... At 614 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kilgore to near Nenzel to 12 miles south of Cody, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kilgore, Nenzel and Anderson Bridge State Wildlife Management Area. This includes Highway 20 between mile markers 161 and 180. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
